about_the_game:
Be the manager of a motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Build, renovate, expand and grow your business to attract more customers. Clean, design and furnish your rooms. Choose styles, color schemes, equipments and decorations to create a unique atmosphere and get the maximum revenue possible. Keep your shop shelves full of products that travellers might need.


Design your rooms (floor, walls and roof) and furnish them, keep them clean to satisfy your customers. You will have a lot of choices so bring your creative ideas to life.


Provide every product you can. Order, stock in warehouse and keep track of the prices to make profit. Design your shop as you wish and keep it clean, otherwise customers will leave immediately. Place different shelves and fridges inside your shop and keep them full.


High popularity means more customers and high rating means happy to pay customers. Make sure you serve them in time and provide every thing they need. Customers are always right.


At some point you will not be able to run everything by yourself. Cash register, fuel pump, cleaning, motel check in/out and shelf filling are a lot of work. But don't worry, you can build a staff room and hire people to help you with all of it. But you will have to do the management and be the boss.


Order shipments of products/equipment and every thing you need run your motel. Set prices for shop products and room renting. Give your employees assignments and make sure you're paying them.


Expand your business to serve more customers and make more profit, three fuel pumps are better than just one as long as there are customers to serve, so make sure to invest in the right place.


you can add a lot of ideas to your motel, such as payphones and vending machines to make more money. Or build a bus station to attract more customers. You can even place ads in your motel area to generate more cash (if you have the required popularity).

Key Features

  • Renovate, clean, furnish and expand an abandoned motel.
  • Design your rooms and equip them and make them ready to accept guests.
  • Order shipments, fill shelves with different products.
  • Hire employees to help you in your journey.
  • Manage your stock, prices and upgrade your work places.
  • Serve customers and keep them satisfied.

name: Motel Manager Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can use a modern integrated GPU if you stick to a lower display resolution like 720p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Restore an old motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Design, furnish, decorate and rent rooms. provide products for customers and fuel for cars. Hire employees to help you and be the boss of your own empire.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Simplified Chinese, German, Dutch, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
